title: Hlimin lawm rawh u Tlantu a lo kal ta
lyrics:
Hlimin lawm rawh u,Tlantu a lo kal ta,
A mutna, a kraws leh a thlan va en la.

Fakin au la, mi an khenbeh chanchin chu hril rawh.
Fakin au la, 'A nung leh ta,' tih lawmin hril rawh.

Hlimin lawm rawh u, ni a lo eng ta e,
Chhum zing chu a kiang ta, hlim kai chu a reh.

Hlimin lawm rawh u, a thisen hlu vang chuan,
Tlanna kawng siam zovin sual man a pe ta.

Hlimin lawm rawh u, chhandamna thlawn pek kha,
Fel lote tan mi fel, kraws-ah a thi ta.

Hlimin lawm rawh u, Beramno thia kha,
Thihna ngam zawh hnua a nun leh vang chuan.

Hlimin lawm rawh u, Lalpa ropui ber hian,
Min tawngtai sak si, a van thutthlengah khian.

Hlimin lawm rawh u, a lo kal leh ngei dawn,
Beramno thi chu, a ropui nen chuan.
